message.entry: An incorrect setting was detected for parameter ''{0}'' in block ''{1}''. It must be a finite real or complex 2-dimensional matrix.
An incorrect setting was detected for parameter ''{0}'' in block ''{1}''. It must be a finite real or complex vector.
An incorrect setting was detected for parameter ''{0}'' in block ''{1}''. It must be a finite real vector.

The width of ''{0}'' parameter is inconsistent with parameter ''{1}'' in block ''{2}''. The width of the Gain parameter for a valid zero-pole system must be either one or equal to the number of columns of the Zeros parameter matrix for a single-input multiple-output system.
给定零极点模块 ''{0}'' 的时域实现失败。检查 ''{1}''、''{2}'' 和 ''{3}'' 参数的值。
仿真运行时参数 ''{0}'' 中的变化导致产生的传递函数的顺序发生变化。
参数 ''{0}'' 的变化导致模块输出显式依赖于模块输入，从而导致数据依赖关系的变化。仿真是在没有此依赖关系的情况下启动的，且不能在运行时进行更改。
A change in parameters for block ''{0}'' is not allowed when the simulation is running because it causes a structural change in the time domain realization of the zero-pole system.
An incorrect setting was detected for zero-pole block parameters. Check the zero-pole block parameters value.
